programme.title: The Democrat Convention of 1924
programme.short_synopsis: The disordered state of the Democrat campaign and their chaotic convention of 1924.
programme.medium_synopsis: Divisions within the Democrats both current and at Madison Square Garden in 1924, Anthony Kennedy's appointment to the Supreme Court; and Woody Allen's new son Satchel.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
